Flow.description: 25Aug25 - Remove "POC - Trial" from Sales Type on screen flow (CS) 18Mar25 - Bypass BAPI Customers in Add-on Flow 12March25- Faizan - Added new Sales type 'POC Trial' 24Feb25- Faizan - Remove lead source being set to CHAT 28Jan25 - CC - added Flywheel Cross-Sell to Sales type dropdown 01Jan25 - DON - removed previous buttons from confirmation screens and made sales type required on one screen (ESS1466) 15Aug23 - CC(SDA) - removed RelatedContactRC record choice set from flow. 08JUN23 - CC(SDA) - add additional criteria to Contact add portion to prevent the duplicate check from causing a flow error related to record access caused by the private sharing model 30MAY23 CC - Change the contact choice to look at Account contact relationship instead of the account. 13Feb25 - SF360-841 - Updated the StageName Values

fields.name: Unable
fields.fieldText: Add-On Opportunity cannot be created for this Subscription at the moment. This issue is due to a data setup problem. Please escalate this matter to your Salesforce Administrator for immediate resolution before retrying.

Contact is a required field!!!


Please either select a contact or click a check box "Create a New Contact".

screens.label: No Opportunity Created/ Create New False

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: No selection is Made. Either Select Opportunity to work on or click Create New checkbox. If you intend to end the flow then click on Finish.

fields.name: nosubscriptions1
fields.fieldText: There are either no Subscriptions for this account or existing subscriptions does not qualify for Add-On/Upgrade/Downgrade/Cancellation.

fields.name: NoSubscriptions
fields.fieldText: This Account is not eligible for Upgrades/Add-Ons because its not an active Customer. If this Account is a Prospect, please follow the New Sign Up Process. If this Account is a Former Customer, please first create a new Account and then follow New Sign Up process.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoSubscriptions
fields.fieldText: This Account is not eligible for Upgrades/Add-Ons because there's no active subscription.

fields.name: ConfirmationMessage_0
fields.fieldText: Here is the list of opportunities that are in Pending Status. Kindly use one of these opportunities or Check "Create New" box and click Next.
